direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods apply predicates to validate elements in a bag, but one operates on a sorted bag while the other on a regular bag.
Both methods return a modified version of a sorted bag, with similar control flows and exception handling.

direct_enhancements.method_name: transformingSortedBag(SortedBag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the behavior of a sorted bag, but one applies a predicate while the other applies a transformer.
Both methods return a modified version of a sorted bag, with similar resource access patterns.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing an empty sorted bag can be used to set up the test environment for predicatedSortedBag.
The predicatedBag method can be invoked before predicatedSortedBag to ensure the predicate is correctly applied.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to modifying the bag, making unmodifiableSortedBag useful for assertions.
